title: The Gaffer's Pipe (1U292)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Pipe
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to remove (X).
Lore:	”'This … is the one art that we certainly claim to be our own invention. When Hobbits first began to smoke is not known….'”
Rarity:	U
